txt.en: 'The Dunlendings use the dusk-hounds of the Gravenwood as hunting dogs. They are a vicious breed with a keen sense of smell. A couple of the Horse-lord's mounts were badly mauled by the dogs...we would do well, I think, to slay a few dusk-hounds and lessen the threat they pose.\n\n'What say you? Shall we hunt the pack?'
'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]. There will be fewer dusk-hounds now to harry us and our allies.'
Andreg is taking you to meet with Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp; however, he needs help with his own mission first.
Andreg has asked you to help him slay a few dusk-hounds in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
You should speak with Andreg about your successes against the dusk-hounds of the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
